channel.title: RuneScape III
channel.description:
Multiple Characters per Account Changes and Choice as to whether users play via leopard or mouse Make the game more narrative-based, with greater influence on storylines with general gameplay Massive involvement with the Gods (making alliances) High risk, high return gameplay (in combat to gambling) Rework to summoning: pet system, general leveling, usefulness of familiars, return on investment, etc. Updates to agility: change in relationship between energy, running and agility. Other updates to runecrafting, fletching and other skills in relation to players making their own equipment and ammunition. (long term)
http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/RuneScape_3 Shit ton of updates coming in 2013. Opinions?

item.title: RuneScape III
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:14, topic:464849”]It just means its the 3rd major overhaul of the game. Technically it should be the 4th/5th, but whatever.[/quote]thats wut im sayin

item.title: RuneScape III
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

It’s still RuneScape. It’s just that RuneScape 3 is the project name. RS3 is inside of RS.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape III
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

the elve age:

Anyone know if they plan to continue RS2 or any other part RS?

Nope. They said they are more interested in the future than preserving the past. There will be no rs2 server because they feel the changes they are making are wanted unlike the rsc -> rs2 a lot of people hated it.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape III
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Same reason WoW has expansion names, Guild wars counts by version, as does almost every other game in existence that does big updates.

Read full topic

item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Why can’t they just call it runescape? I mean, it’s dumb to count it cause they were doing that with CoD until it got old.

item.title: RuneScape III
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

Don’t completely understand why they are calling it “3” but whatever. Because the transition from 1-2 was a complete rewrite of their game. This is just a massive facelift.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape III
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

RuneScape 3 will also include updates like:

  • Advanced graphics
  • Audio
  • Lighting and textures
  • Customisable interface
  • RS would run on HTML5

Source:

RuneScape Wiki

Upcoming updates

This page is a list of upcoming RuneScape updates. Jagex are aiming to introduce more fun and sociable skilling methods, with more rewards being gained when they are used interactively with other players. The representative example is Deep Sea...

item.title: RuneScape III
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

This was talked about in the livestreams, one of which I summarized for people, but I guess it’s ok to have it all in one place.

One thing it is missing is that they said the UI will be much more customizable, being able to move around parts of the interface to better suit your needs, which I think is a big thing. Overall, it sounds pretty cool.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape III

Multiple Characters per Account Changes and Choice as to whether users play via leopard or mouse Make the game more narrative-based, with greater influence on storylines with general gameplay Massive involvement with the Gods (making alliances) High risk, high return gameplay (in combat to gambling) Rework to summoning: pet system, general leveling, usefulness of familiars, return on investment, etc. Updates to agility: change in relationship between energy, running and agility. Other updates to runecrafting, fletching and other skills in relation to players making their own equipment and ammunition. (long term)
RuneScape Wiki

RuneScape 3

RuneScape 3 is a large collection of new features added to the existing game, released on 22 July 2013, included a reworked orchestrated soundtrack, a new customisable user interface, and new camera controls. Development on RuneScape 3 was first...

Shit ton of updates coming in 2013. Opinions?
